name: Plop
description:
A very simple and casual game made for children of diverse ages. It has several levels of challenge, increasing the difficulty gradually.

Scenes and colorful and cheerful characters. It can help in the practice of motor coordination, the speed of reflexes and attention to detail.

Main features:

• Easy to play: tap to pop the bubbles or capture rewards. Click at the trash to collect it.

• Light and colorful: Casual game with light difficulty, colorful and fun theme. Play with the little crab while you're distracted.

• Ecological: Help clean the sea. The crab is sad when trash escapes and very happy when the trash is collected.

• For all ages: Can be played by children 6 years or older, but is also a good hobby for any age.

• No languages: The game is intuitive and the crab passes through balloons and drawings the fundamental concepts of the game.

• It does not make you spend your money internally. The game has no built-in real money shopping system. The paid version (to be released soon) only charges you for the purchase of the game and nothing else.
